00045

00050     void StopSearch();
00051 
00052     bool IsAvailable();
00053 
00054 private:
00055     SimpleString SearchName;
00056 
00057     char Regtype[RegtypeLength];

00060     bool IsResolved;
00061     IsServiceValidForMe CallBack;
00062     void * UserData;
00063 
00064     // Call by other classes to say if a new service appears or desappears

00066 };
